name: Puzzles By Axis
description: Three simple and intuitive kinds of puzzles are ready to test your abilities of problem-solving. With a soft difficulty curve, going from relaxing puzzles to very complicated ones, countless hours of fun awaits you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium Dual Core Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
